title: Buffs to "Skill" Champs...Making them OP
body: Why did they buff Riven? she is easier now and has great aoe damage + cc not to mention the aa cancel. Same with Vayne, with the new trending vayne build she does broken damage with that shiv and assassin build? and then jayce...where do I begin? so much damage, you might say his late game is not that good but CAN BE good if he has the right items...why, these champs with "skill" got buff and now meta except Vayne but I bet she will be meta soon.

replies.body:
The game state in it's entirety is a mess at the moment. So many champs have become broken etc due to all the changes and items sets.

It'd be nice if Riot stopped introducing such drastic changes all at once and then balancing it out after it becomes obvious something is broken.
I'm fine with {{champion:67}} being OP, I just 100% ban her every game anyway.

She still needs to be changed right now/soon, she is just way to strong, pre-6 she is manageable, post-6 and onwards she is just a monster especially if she gets fed/the game progresses more to the late game.
Let them be OP, let them win tons of games, make their winrate skyrocket, so Riot can nerf them to the ground, just like azir
